data.name: Text
data.text: Radio Frequency Shielding NuShield® is used to block Radio frequency waves for noise and artefact free Imaging in MRI Scanner, Good and long-lasting RF Cage is most essential part of a MRI Scanner, Our RF Cages made of Copper and Galvanised Iron assures more thank 100db attenuation and installed according to OEM specifications. The NuShield® RF Doors designed and manufactured in our factory carries lifetime warranty and ensures trouble free operations.
